summary: Add a new set of heavy Armour to the game and comes with high resolution textures for male and female.
descriptionHtml:
This mod add a new set of heavy armor(enchant-able) to the game.That armor has been modeled and textured from scratch.I consider this still be a work in progress but i decided to release it anyway to show that I'm not just showing off lol.

*****UPDATE V1.1*******

This update add a number of fixes to the first version of the armor.

*Fixes list:

-The piece of metal obstructing the view has been removed
-Armor menus models added
-The Armor is now craft-able and temper-able ,you will need both the draconic and advanced armor smiting perk.
-Increased the armor ratings (slightly above daedric ratings).
-Armor now available to female characters(though it won't be curvaceous ,nor revealing.It's in any shape and form identical to the male armor)
-Add a "no Horns" version.You will have to copy the texture located in "Textures/Armor/Nordplate/NO HORNS" and paste it in the "Textures/Armor/Nordplate" folder, they will ask you if you want to overwrite.Click yes.

*The armor does level up with its wearer and the base ratings are:
-Boots: 20 ,+2p over daedric
-gauntlet:20 ,+2p over daedric
-Armor:59 ,+10p over daedric
-Helmet:25 ,+2p over daedric

*Where to find it:

-In a new chest located on the far left of the Dragonreach great porch.
Term of use

-To any forge assuming you have the draconic armor and advanced armor perk.


*Installation

To install Just extract the contents(including folders) of this rar file into your Skyrim game folder.Comes with an esp file you can check and un-check in the launch menu

You will need to download and install the 1.0 version first then download and install the 1.1 update.

OPTIONAL BETA

I added a BETA update adding a body weight slider to the armor.Some people have been complaining about it being a bit skinny and not matching up with their character body type.IT"S A BETA!
